description: A built-in service provider for sardines.js
name: sardines-shoal

scripts.build: npm run clear && npm run compileRepo && npm run compileAgent && npm run reverseCompile && npm run publishRepositoryInterfaces && tsc --build conf/tsconfig.json && npm run makeExec
scripts.clearPackages: if [ -d ./node_modules/sardines-service-provider-http -o -d ./node_modules/sardines-service-driver-http ];then npm uninstall sardines-service-provider-http service-driver-http; fi
scripts.makeExec: npm run makeExecRepo && npm run makeExecManRepo
scripts.makeExecManRepo: file=./lib/manager/manageRepository.js; { echo '#!/usr/bin/env node'; cat $file; } > ${file}.tmp && mv ${file}.tmp $file && chmod a+x $file
scripts.makeExecRepo: file=./lib/deployServices.js; { echo '#!/usr/bin/env node'; cat $file; } > ${file}.tmp && mv ${file}.tmp $file && chmod a+x $file
scripts.prepareStart: npm run init && npm run build
scripts.startRepo: npm run genConfig && npm run prepareStart && npm run genDefaultAgentDeployPlan && node lib/deployServices.js ./sardines-services-agent.json ./deploy-agent.json ./sardines-services-repository.json ./deploy-repository-dev.json
scripts.test: npm run build && node lib/agent/host_perf.js test
scripts.testDeployHost: npm run build && ./bin/deploy_host.py --host-name nw-dev01 --os-user rin --repo-deploy-file deploy-repository-dev.json
scripts.stop: if [ `ps -ef|grep 'node lib/deployServices.js'|grep -v grep|grep -v 'npm run stop'|wc -l` -gt 0 ];then ps -ef|grep 'node lib/deployServices.js'|grep -v grep|grep -v 'npm run stop'; ps -ef|grep 'node lib/deployServices.js'|grep -v grep|grep -v 'npm run stop'|awk '{print $2}'|xargs kill -9; echo 'sardines stopped'; fi
scripts.prepublish: npm run clearPackages && npm run build
